website_summaries.verdict: Attractive fireman red portable propane fryer can do it all from deep frying to searing. Has deep cooking surface and makes any kind of food taste flavorful.
pros: Easy to assemble and take apart without tools
Fits inside a trunk or RV
Durable, sturdy, and of good quality
The more you use it, the better food tastes
Perfect for using in the backyard, when camping, tailgating, and more
cons: Burner may be too small for some users
No converter hose is included in case you want to hook it into a larger propane tank

customer_reviews.title: NOW IT WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I had to modify the burner, the one it comes with is WAY TOO SMALL, only heating ONLY 10 inches in tge the center, and Not the rest. If you look at the picture, you will see the modificattion I made, NOW IT WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Devoto

customer_reviews.title: Best use to stir fry.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but don't love it. If you stir fry often, this is perfect. I use it for making Mexican and Asian dishes. It's not good for most things you cook because of the wok shape. I got the tall one and wish I got the short one. Don't get the shallow one.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tilly

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with the burner
customer_reviews.text: The product is of very good quality but the burner does not have enough power to heat the disc
customer_reviews.author: Rosana Balut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooker!!
customer_reviews.text: The firedisk is perfect for all my cooking needs! It's built tough and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: It is the best. So easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: This grill is rocking. It is the best. So easy to set up and use. Storage is a breeze. Cleans up in no time. Takes up practically no space. Food taste wonderful. Have even made pancakes on it. Husband just had to try it and it came out great. Love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The package arrive at my house in horrible packaging and frame was bent. It was very heavy, which is good because to me that means sturdy, however, it's too heavy and bulky for a single woman to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: La Porte, Texas

customer_reviews.title: I bought his for my husband after seeing great reviews on our Camping in Texas facebook group
customer_reviews.text: I bought his for my husband after seeing great reviews on our Camping in Texas facebook group. It did not disappoint!!!! I cook just about anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Why did I have to pay a return fee when the damaged package was not my fault. Came off truck like that.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: Burgers cooked perfect put veggies didn’t
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and I had to use it. Fast setup, cleaned and oiled and threw some mango habanero burgers with stir fry veggies on HI. Burgers cooked perfect put veggies didn’t. I kind of burned the firedisc. Not enough seasoning. Veggies under cooked. Not a firedisc problem. Had a little extra cleaning to get it ready but don’t give up. It’s a Matter of learning how to use it best. Great product. Having breakfast from it in the morning. Ron from Lake Cumberland KY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Firedisc would have worked better if it wouldn’t have been damaged when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great shipping! Nice “Package”! LOL
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome cooker! I was actually impressed how it was delivered by an actual Amazon truck with two handlers. Packaging was great and product didn’t have a scratch on it! Loved being able to assemble right out of the box, attach a tank, and start cooking...of course after seasoning it. Love my Firedisc!
customer_reviews.author: Israel Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great grill very portable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most bad ass compact grill ever! Works on windy days at the lake or in the back yard. Works to cook anything. Makes a mean stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marco

customer_reviews.title: Fire disk
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty steel disk, easily packs into compartment of my fifth wheel. Great for camping and at home. I bought the wind helmet and contoured spatula as well. All items were of good quality and would buy from this company again. Only thing I would like to purchase is a lid for the disk but did not see that option. That is the only down side to this product (no lid available).
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy2much

customer_reviews.title: Cook outside? BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy setup and how quickly it heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price-we’ll made.. get the wind screen to be safe.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little too tall but other one was too short.. Haven’t used it much becuz it’s still too windy but is well made.. I wish they sold the Wok pan separately but this will do.
customer_reviews.author: lola's mom

customer_reviews.title: Cooking party!!
customer_reviews.text: We love our firedisc!! We have been using it daily from amazing stir frys to frying up mozzarella sticks for the kids! If you are considering buying this just do it you will not regret it. Last weekend we took it camping. We did breakfast, lunch and dinner for a crowd of fifteen. This has been a great purchase for our family
customer_reviews.author: M.J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cooker! We use it all the time. It could be even better if it came with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Ward

customer_reviews.title: Disassembles into 3 pieces quickly
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s Portable and fairly easy to clean. I like that it cooks really quickly too. Don’t like having to tote it 20 feet away from my apartment to cook. Great product for camping or tailgating!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: A joy to cook on
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built, should last a very long time certainly longer than a comparably priced conventional grill Cooks everything and clean up is simple. I’m looking forward to doing duck Poppers without all the nasty flare ups of a conventional gas grill
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hedden Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: What can't you cook with this? Season it very well the first time you use it. Keep it oiled and stored inside its raw steel inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eric b

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooker. Great for both my at and camp cooking needs. Has been meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Don D. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 36 inch firedisc and all I got was just the pan.....seriously where's the legs and burner.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Puts out good heat. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance J Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. Great product. Easy to clean and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Serena Way

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to clean up therefore I don't use it as often as I thought I would
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heavy duty grill
customer_reviews.text: Amazing heavy duty grill. Great for camping. Easy to assemble and disassemble for transporting. Cooking is a breeze on it! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J Brady Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel isn’t really good disco material.
customer_reviews.text: Nice handy stand. Not sure I like the stainless steel disc. I turned the burner with the disc on in the dark and the flames do cover a good area of the disco. I picked my up at a great price, and since I purchased mine it has gone up over $160.00. I have 3 other discos and this is not my favorite. Will use my disc with this stand and burner.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Moya

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing. Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: We've only cook on it once thus far. (Chicken fajitas) They turned out juicy. Just amazing. Very happy so far. Cooks faster/better then a regular gas grill. I don't work for this company. Just wanted to write a review as I haven't seen one on here or the Internet.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts rendering product unusable
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have tried this product. I ordered it last November during a big promo. I just opened it as I wanted to make fish at the lake. The actual pan was missing from the box, making it unusable. I understand it was a long time ago but my only option was to return it and then turn around and buy it at 1.5 times the cost. I don’t understand how you forget the most important part of the product.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: sorry set up
customer_reviews.text: did not come with hose to connect tank to unit , 400 bucks for grille , now have to buy 30 buck hose -- sorry
customer_reviews.author: Jjoe

customer_reviews.title: Weak flame problem solved
customer_reviews.text: You don’t need to modify burner you just need to peel off the sticker on the nobe and tight up the L rench screw that increases the flow of the gas. It works great!! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Daniel carranza

customer_reviews.title: Shop elsewhere for addons.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But. The wind guard should come standard. Don't buy anything else with the name. Yeti type marketing. DO NOT BUY ANY OF THERE ADDONS!!!! there are way better options for 25% of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Corey G.

product_meta.title: Original FIREDISC- 36” Tall Propane Cooker Red
product_meta.description: Color:Fireman RedNothing beats the smell of sizzling, juicy steaks. Except, of course, steaks and veggies being cooked together on your FireDisc Deep 36" Tall Portable Cooker! It has a spacious 22" concave cooking surface and is completely collapsible. The FireDisc Cooker is easily portable and built to last with no assembly required. You can boil, fry, sear, or simmer. Thanks to the seasoning effect, the FireDisc's cooking surface actually improves the flavor of your food each time you use it. Cooking on uneven ground? No problem. The FireDisc features an adjustable stand, allowing you to set up a flat and even cooking surface no matter the terrain. Cleanup takes mere minutes. Once you're finished cooking, simply clean the FireDisc with water and wipe with oil. No need for soap or excessive scrubbing! Unlike a grill, a FireDisc is completely portable and designed to fold up and lie flat, so you can slide it into the back of your trunk, truck, or SUV for those hunting, fishing, and camping trips. There are no screws, nuts, or bolts to worry about. Powder-coated at 450° F, FireDisc stands strong against all outdoor conditions. They are hand-inspected and made from the highest-quality carbon steel available. The FireDisc Deep comes in your choice of black or red and weighs 58.8 lbs. FireDisc challenges you to put it to the test, and you'll quickly find it to be the most rugged, easy-to-use, and versatile cooker you can find. Buy yours today and become part of the family of satisfied FireDisc owners!
feature_bullets: CARBON STEEL CONSTRUCTION: The FireDisc travel cooker is the best tool for outdoor cooking enthusiasts. Whether you’re grilling some brats or fry-cooking a delicious feast, this disc cooker’s round pan design offers durability and versatility. FireDiscs are made with high-quality carbon steel that will hold up to heavy-duty use.

COOK ANY FOOD, ANYWHERE: This cooker is designed for you to grill in your backyard, while tailgating, or while camping. FireDisc grills can cook virtually any food. Use it to prepare BBQ meats, scrambled eggs, pancakes, bacon, sausage, stew, veggies, and even fish. The walled design can contain high volumes of food and liquids, which makes it ideal for deep frying and preparing soups.

COMFORTABLE 36 INCH HEIGHT: This FireDisc set includes a convenient stand with bending legs to accommodate uneven outside surfaces. The height means you don’t have to bend over or strain your back after a long day of adventures. It’s completely collapsible and portable, making it perfect for setting up in your yard or camp area.

PROPANE GAS READY: The LP regulator in the FireDisc is designed to run off a 16.4 oz. green propane tank, but it is also adaptable to a white 20 lb. propane tank with a 4 ft. FireDisc Conversion Adapter LP Hose. The built-in FireDisc Heat Ring is powder-coated at 450 degrees. It’s the perfect accessory for a chef on the go!

A PORTABLE BBQ GRILL: Our FireDisc Cooker is perfect to take camping, tailgating, picnicking, hunting, or fishing because it is both portable and durable. Our cookers are also easy to use, clean, and maintain, so you can use them for everyday cooking at home on your patio or in your backyard.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
